attributes.action: ADHD waiting times for diagnosis and medication
attributes.additional_details: Reduce the wait times. Help children have more options for medication and diagnosis
attributes.background: The waiting times for diagnosis and also medication is years long with thousands of children undiagnosed or medicated suffering and loosing valuable education

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700568
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700033
